interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Return To Zero
Review Date: 2015/05/03
Store: Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones  (Actor),     Sean Hanish  (Director, Writer)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ["Based on a true story, Return to Zero follows a successful couple, MINNIE DRIVER and PAUL ADELSTEIN, preparing for the arrival of their first child. Just weeks before their due date, they discover their son has died in the womb and will be stillborn. Lives and relationships forever altered by the loss, they try to cope, but nothing can save their marriage. That's when they discover that they're again pregnant and must come together to face a turbulent and terrifying pregnancy. Watch this powerful moving story unfold in this special DVD set including 14 behind-the-scenes videos, short films by the RTZ community and the original Kickstarter fundraising video."]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones, Sean Hanish, Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly KahlMinnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones, Sean Hanish, Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly Kahl   See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.54 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CANO9368955DVD', 'Director': 'Sean Hanish', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 12, 2018', 'Actors': 'Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Producers': 'Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly Kahl', 'Studio': 'Cannonball Productions', 'Writers': 'Sean Hanish', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Ok movie, touching but hard to watch if you've lost a child of any age.
Review Title: touching movie, worth the purchase
Rating: 3.0

reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Genéa Gaudet', 'Adam Hirsch'], 'Producers': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Christopher Poole', 'Bill Hayes', 'Jen Stocks', 'Kirk Streb', 'Mary Wilcher', 'Maggie Kay', 'Deanie Wilcher'], 'Studio': ['TLC']} After watching all the seasons of Sisterwives, I feel I have come to love them and all that they stand for. I am "mainstream" LDS. It is against our beliefs to live this type of life because it is against the law. BUT, I have such respect for the Brown family and all that they stand for. They are true to the faith. I could never condemn or otherwise harrass these beautiful people. I believe in religious freedom and think the government needs to stay out of these peoples lives. They have wonderful relationships though they do have dissagreements as would any family. Those children are soooo loved and they know it. Cody is a great Dad and husband and if only more men were like him, what a better world this would be. Each and every one of these wives are amazing, kind and loving individuals. They just want peace for their family. God bless you Brown family and hang in there. I believe there will come a time when you will be allowed to practice your religion with no fear.

I relate your situation to the persecution of the first LDS people in the early days of the restoration of the gospel. I would love to meet you one day as I'm sure I would grow as a person, just from being in the presence of each and everyone of your delightful spirits. Hugs and love from an LDS woman. Amazing way of life....in a good way {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Genéa Gaudet', 'Adam Hirsch'], 'Producers': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Christopher Poole', 'Bill Hayes', 'Jen Stocks', 'Kirk Streb', 'Mary Wilcher', 'Maggie Kay', 'Deanie Wilcher'], 'Studio': ['TLC']} I am hooked on this darn show. I love watching these guys. Great kids and great parents. I can't wait until they get those houses built. Great show Celebrity Wife Swap Unscripted ['Celebrity Wife Swap features the unlikeliest of moms swapping lives, including Splash contestant and Playmate Kendra Wilkinson and reality super mom Kate Gosselin of Kate Plus Eight fame.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Pamela Bower', 'Alex Cross', 'Bruce Toms', 'Jack Isacksen', 'Michael Davies', 'Tony Yates', 'Valerie Castillo', 'Ken Snow', 'Bailey Grizzle', 'Katie Bramble']} Loved it! Two different worlds collide and it was very interesting to watch them handle the challenges. Love Kate and Kendra! love Kendra Wilkenson and Kate Gosslin. What an interesting switch but I loved it. {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Chad Greulach', 'Steve Paley'], 'Producers': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Gene Simmons', 'Erin Kelly Richards', 'Natalie Gecht', 'Antonia Mattia', 'Matthew E. Fitzgerald'], 'Starring': ['Shannon Tweed', 'Nick Simmons', 'Sophie Simmons'], 'Studio': ['A&E Television Networks']} Someone once told me that when you have money nothing changes, theproblems just get bigger. The Simmons Tweed family are proof. VERY DOWN TO EARTH and fun loving people. Wonderful people {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kathryn Bigelow'], 'Producers': ['Colin Wilson', 'Greg Shapiro', 'Ted Schipper', 'Mark Boal', 'Kathryn Bigelow', 'Megan Ellison'], 'Starring': ['Jessica Chastain', 'Mark Strong', 'Joel Edgerton'], 'Studio': ['SONY PICTURES ENTERTAINMENT', 'INC.']} Read the book and the film followed the book very well. Really enjoyed it. Great telling of a necessary event in history. great film {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Keith Truesdell', 'Anson Williams', 'Gail Bradley', 'Lindsley Parsons III', 'Jason Priestley', 'Ron Underwood', 'John Schneider', 'Barry Watson'], 'Producers': ['Lindsley Parsons III', 'Hrag Gaboudian', 'Elaine Arata'], 'Studio': ['Freeform']} This is not right, I am a prime member and should have gotten this for free, but it charged me. I want this refunded and I won't be doing this anymore. PERIOD! This is false advertising! I was charged $1.99 for this when it should have been free because I am a Prime member. What? {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Chad Greulach', 'Steve Paley'], 'Producers': ['Adam Freeman', 'Adam Reed', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Gene Simmons', 'Erin Kelly Richards', 'Natalie Gecht', 'Antonia Mattia', 'Matthew E. Fitzgerald'], 'Starring': ['Shannon Tweed', 'Nick Simmons', 'Sophie Simmons']} Love this show. It does seem they are running out of steam though. Kinda struggling for content on the last two of the season. Best show ever {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jack Bender', 'Peter Leto', 'David Barrett', 'Sergio Mimica-Gezzan', 'Kari Skogland', 'Eriq La Salle', 'Edward Ornelas', 'Peter Weller', 'Roxann Dawson', 'Paul A. Edwards'], 'Starring': ['Mike Vogel', 'Rachelle Lefevre', 'Natalie Martinez'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Really enjoyed the pilot. Seems like it will be a great show, I'm excited to watch the rest. Good job. Great sow so far Sister Wives Unscripted, Drama ["After a rough two years of living in rentals, Kody, his four wives and 17 children hope to soon move into their four adjacent homes. Tensions rise as the Browns struggle to find success in the wives' jewelry business, while the older children consider going to college out of state and the wives face difficult personal decisions."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Genéa Gaudet', 'Adam Hirsch'], 'Producers': ['Tim Gibbons', 'Christopher Poole', 'Bill Hayes', 'Jen Stocks', 'Kirk Streb', 'Mary Wilcher', 'Maggie Kay', 'Deanie Wilcher']} This program deals with very real issues. It is a great show and these people are to be commended for their dedication/commitment to their belief. Very real {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Karl Kimbrough'], 'Producers': ['Erin Flinn'], 'Starring': ['Tori Spelling', 'Dean McDermott'], 'Studio': ['A&E Television Networks']} How kind and difficult to put your life out there for others when you are in so much pain. I learned so much from this series, from Ms. Spellings reactions and processes of grief and healing to Mr. Mcdermotts behavior and handling of the process. Their open honest telling and living of this story is one that is helpful to all who will watch and listen. I am greatful for this and loved the series for what I was able to implement in my own life. Very helpful and great learning process. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jack Bender', 'Peter Leto', 'David Barrett', 'Sergio Mimica-Gezzan', 'Kari Skogland', 'Eriq La Salle', 'Edward Ornelas', 'Peter Weller', 'Roxann Dawson', 'Paul A. Edwards'], 'Starring': ['Mike Vogel', 'Rachelle Lefevre', 'Alexander Koch'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} I love this show. The story line is so neat and the characters seem so real. Just weeks before their due date, they discover their son has died in the womb and will be stillborn. Lives and relationships forever altered by the loss, they try to cope, but nothing can save their marriage. That's when they discover that they're again pregnant and must come together to face a turbulent and terrifying pregnancy. Watch this powerful moving story unfold in this special DVD set including 14 behind-the-scenes videos, short films by the RTZ community and the original Kickstarter fundraising video."] {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones, Sean Hanish, Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly KahlMinnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones, Sean Hanish, Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly Kahl See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.54 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CANO9368955DVD', 'Director': 'Sean Hanish', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 47 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 12, 2018', 'Actors': 'Minnie Driver, Paul Adelstein, Alfred Molina, Connie Nielsen, Andrea Anders, Kathy Baker, Sarah Jones', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Producers': 'Sean Hanish, Paul Jaconi-Biery, Kelly Kahl', 'Studio': 'Cannonball Productions', 'Writers': 'Sean Hanish', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Ok movie, touching but hard to watch if you've lost a child of any age. touching movie, worth the purchase

description: Based on a true story, Return to Zero follows a successful couple, MINNIE DRIVER and PAUL ADELSTEIN, preparing for the arrival of their first child. Just weeks before their due date, they discover their son has died in the womb and will be stillborn. Lives and relationships forever altered by the loss, they try to cope, but nothing can save their marriage. That's when they discover that they're again pregnant and must come together to face a turbulent and terrifying pregnancy. Watch this powerful moving story unfold in this special DVD set including 14 behind-the-scenes videos, short films by the RTZ community and the original Kickstarter fundraising video.
